Package org.drasyl.messenger

Interface MessageSink

  • public interface MessageSink
    Implement this interface and add the object to the Messenger to provide new communication paths for the node

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CompletableFuture<Void> send​(RelayableMessage message)
      Sends message to recipient.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        CompletableFuture<Void> send​(RelayableMessage message)
        Sends message to recipient.
        Parameters:
        message - message to be sent
        Returns:
        a completed future if the message was successfully processed, otherwise an exceptionally future
